00926 typedef struct Gan_Pixel
00927 {
00929    Gan_ImageFormat format;
00930 
00932    Gan_Type type;
00933 
00935    union
00936    {
00938       union
00939       {
00940          unsigned char  uc;
00941          short          s;
00942          unsigned short us;
00943          int            i;
00944          unsigned int   ui;
00945          double         d;
00946          float          f;
00947          Gan_Bool       b;
00948          void          *p;
00949 
00950          gan_uint8 ui8;
00951          gan_uint16 ui16;
00952          gan_uint32 ui32;
00953          Gan_YXPixel_ui10 ui10;
00954          Gan_YXPixel_ui12 ui12;
00955       } gl;
00956 
00958       union
00959       {
00960          Gan_GLAPixel_uc uc;
00961          Gan_GLAPixel_s  s;
00962          Gan_GLAPixel_us us;
00963          Gan_GLAPixel_i  i;
00964          Gan_GLAPixel_ui ui;
00965          Gan_GLAPixel_d  d;
00966          Gan_GLAPixel_f  f;
00967 
00968          Gan_GLAPixel_ui8 ui8;
00969          Gan_GLAPixel_ui16 ui16;
00970          Gan_GLAPixel_ui32 ui32;
00971       } gla;
00972 
00974       union
00975       {
00976          Gan_RGBPixel_uc uc;
00977          Gan_RGBPixel_s  s;
00978          Gan_RGBPixel_us us;
00979          Gan_RGBPixel_i  i;
00980          Gan_RGBPixel_ui ui;
00981          Gan_RGBPixel_d  d;
00982          Gan_RGBPixel_f  f;
00983 
00984          Gan_RGBPixel_ui8 ui8;
00985          Gan_RGBPixel_ui16 ui16;
00986          Gan_RGBPixel_ui32 ui32;
00987       } rgb;
00988 
00990       union
00991       {
00992          Gan_RGBAPixel_uc uc;
00993          Gan_RGBAPixel_s  s;
00994          Gan_RGBAPixel_us us;
00995          Gan_RGBAPixel_i  i;
00996          Gan_RGBAPixel_ui ui;
00997          Gan_RGBAPixel_d  d;
00998          Gan_RGBAPixel_f  f;
00999 
01000          Gan_RGBAPixel_ui8 ui8;
01001          Gan_RGBAPixel_ui16 ui16;
01002          Gan_RGBAPixel_ui32 ui32;
01003          Gan_RGBAPixel_ui12 ui12;
01004       } rgba;
01005 
01007       union
01008       {
01009          Gan_BGRPixel_uc uc;
01010          Gan_BGRPixel_s  s;
01011          Gan_BGRPixel_us us;
01012          Gan_BGRPixel_i  i;
01013          Gan_BGRPixel_ui ui;
01014          Gan_BGRPixel_d  d;
01015          Gan_BGRPixel_f  f;
01016

01020       } bgr;
01021 
01023       union

01037 
01039       union
01040       {
01041          Gan_Vector2_f f;
01042          Gan_Vector2   d;
01043          Gan_Vector2_s s;
01044          Gan_Vector2_i i;
01045       } vfield2D;
01046 
01048       union
01049       {
01050          Gan_Vector3_f f;
01051          Gan_Vector3   d;
01052          Gan_Vector3_s s;
01053          Gan_Vector3_i i;
01054       } vfield3D;
01055 
01057       union
01058       {
01059          Gan_RGBXPixel_ui8   ui8;
01060          Gan_RGBXPixel_ui10 ui10;
01061       } rgbx;
01062 
01064       union
01065       {
01066          Gan_RGBASPixel_ui10 ui10;
01067       } rgbas;
01068 
01070       union
01071       {
01072          Gan_YUVX444Pixel_ui8  ui8;
01073          Gan_YUVX444Pixel_ui16 ui16;
01074       } yuvx444;
01075 
01077       union
01078       {
01079          Gan_YUVA444Pixel_ui8  ui8;
01080          Gan_YUVA444Pixel_ui16 ui16;
01081       } yuva444;
01082 
01084       union
01085       {
01086          Gan_YUV422Pixel_ui8  ui8;
01087          Gan_YUV422Pixel_ui16 ui16;
01088       } yuv422;
01089    } data;
01090 } Gan_Pixel;

01092  unsigned char  gan_pixel_rgbuc_to_yuc ( const Gan_RGBPixel_uc *rgb );
01093  unsigned short gan_pixel_rgbuc_to_yus ( const Gan_RGBPixel_uc *rgb );
01094  unsigned int   gan_pixel_rgbuc_to_yui ( const Gan_RGBPixel_uc *rgb );
01095  unsigned char  gan_pixel_rgbus_to_yuc ( const Gan_RGBPixel_us *rgb );
01096  unsigned short gan_pixel_rgbus_to_yus ( const Gan_RGBPixel_us *rgb );
01097  float          gan_pixel_rgbui_to_yf  ( const Gan_RGBPixel_ui *rgb );
01098  float          gan_pixel_rgbf_to_yf   ( const Gan_RGBPixel_f  *rgb );
01099  double         gan_pixel_rgbd_to_yd   ( const Gan_RGBPixel_d  *rgb );
01100  unsigned char  gan_pixel_rgbauc_to_yuc ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_uc *rgba );
01101  unsigned short gan_pixel_rgbauc_to_yus ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_uc *rgba );
01102  unsigned int   gan_pixel_rgbauc_to_yui ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_uc *rgba );
01103  unsigned char  gan_pixel_rgbaus_to_yuc ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_us *rgba );
01104  unsigned short gan_pixel_rgbaus_to_yus ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_us *rgba );
01105  float          gan_pixel_rgbaui_to_yf  ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_ui *rgba );
01106  float          gan_pixel_rgbaf_to_yf   ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_f  *rgba );
01107  double         gan_pixel_rgbad_to_yd   ( const Gan_RGBAPixel_d  *rgba );
01108 
01109  unsigned char  gan_pixel_bgruc_to_yuc ( const Gan_BGRPixel_uc *bgr );
01110  unsigned short gan_pixel_bgruc_to_yus ( const Gan_BGRPixel_uc *bgr );
01111  unsigned int   gan_pixel_bgruc_to_yui ( const Gan_BGRPixel_uc *bgr );
01112  unsigned char  gan_pixel_bgrus_to_yuc ( const Gan_BGRPixel_us *bgr );
